actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to prohibit any State from imposing a tax on the income derived by any individual from services in the Federal area within such State if such individual is not a resident or domiciliary of such State or of any other State which imposes a tax on income.

summary.text: Prohibits the State income taxation of individuals who work in Federal areas located within any State but do not reside in such State, or any other State which imposes an income tax.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit any State from imposing a tax on the income derived by any individual from services in the Federal area within such State if such individual is not a resident or domiciliary of such State or of any other State which imposes a tax on income.
